definition: five chief demons of folklore personifying pestilence
five chief demons of folklore personifying pestilence/cf four horsemen of the apocalypse
to suffer from a plague/to endure a misfortune/a plague on him!

sentences.english: Also for pan of water, referred to as the "send pestilence."
sentences.chinese: 又作草船泛水，称为“送瘟”。

sentences.english: Vaccination and avoiding contact with infected animals are key elements of canine distemper prevention.
sentences.chinese: 注射疫苗和避免与患狗接触是预防犬瘟的关键因素。

sentences.english: Outbreaks of distemper tend to be sporadic.
No specific drug is available that will kill the virus in infected dogs.
sentences.chinese: 没有能杀犬瘟病毒的特效药。

sentences.english: We acquire the stabilized expressed cell lines through 2W Blasticidin selection.
sentences.chinese: 经过2W杀稻瘟霉素筛选，获得稳定表达的细胞系。

sentences.english: The paper relates the case of the rising illness and diagnose.
sentences.chinese: 本文报告一例鸭瘟病例的发病和诊断。

definition: five chief demons of folklore personifying pestilence
arch. legendary venomous insect/to poison/to bewitch/to drive to insanity/to harm by witchcraft/intestinal parasite
demonic/iniquitous/nefarious/evil/unhealthy influences that cause disease (Chinese medicine)/(coll.) strange/abnormal
boring insect/snout moth's larva (Aphomia gullaris or Plodia interpuncuella or Heliothus armigera etc), major agricultural pest
